Posted By: Mark0z4 (6/16/2009 8:42:11 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
It's similar to a limited use [Isochron Scepter](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Isochron Scepter) on legs.  
  
You can use *any* three instant cards with it.  
You can cast them for their actual cost.  
You don't have to worry about any colors.  
You get to fetch all of these from your library.  
  
No card disadvantage and not a bad card in my opinion, yet keep in mind this guy doesn't copy the removed cards - you play them once and afterwards they go into the graveyard and you won't be able to cast them a second time.
posts.html:
It's similar to a limited use Isochron Scepter on legs.

You don't have to worry about any colors.
You get to fetch all of these from your library.

posts.post_content:
*Duhr Lightning bolt...* Jesus Christ...some people shouldn't be allowed on the internet! Yes Kindulas we KNOW lightning bolt kills it, so does DOOM BLADE, terror, disintigrate...really it's a HUGE expansive list. So, the key here is: have a plan.... if you bring this out without cover, like a counter in hand, a stealthsuit, or...privileged position...well you DESERVE to lose it. That's the 2nd rule in magic.
  
Kill your opponents cool stuff, protect your own cool stuff.

Posted By: Ladon--- (8/12/2011 11:48:08 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
lightning bolt
  
EDIT: Another fun way to use lightning bolt, tutor up three of them (or other fun stuff) and have the interesting effect of... going into your graveyard. The part about her that dissapoints yet fascinates me is that she does no "imprint" and therefore does not cast a copy. While that would be better, and perhaps therefore broken, like a bigass [isochron scepter](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=isochron scepter), she plays the actual card, which means after you tutor up and exile the spell, it goes to your graveyard after you cast it. Use Zeniths and bounce her to your hand!
  
 Seriously guys, I hate the doomblade troll as much as anyone. Maybe more than average actually, I'm mostly quite the greenie ^^
  
EDIT2: The real epic combo is, granted you have 3 copies of the same instant in your deck, she can power a [pyromancer's ascension](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=pyromancer's ascension ) on her own. Personally, I wish she was red blue so I could use her as a general... I just can't imagine using her mono blue! Okay, I hate mono blue ... [(see all)](javascript:void(0);)
